content: Hey all, I'm currently trying to import a big stack of data into a Hapi Server and I was wondering if there is a better way than just POSTing all the bundle to the REST interface. Does anybody have a solution? The current runtime for the import is more than a week, if I'm using the bundle transactions.
Hi @Hannes Ulrich. There is a conversation in the bulk data stream regarding an $import operation that you may find useful/relevant.
